Power and Sample Size Manual Welcome

Power and Sample Size Manual Aniko Szabo 2023-01-03 Welcome This repository is for a Bookdown version of a reference book for power and sample size calculations using R. It is very much a work in progress, and fixes/contributions in the form of pull requests are welcome.
